content: Stocks Investments Asked by AnonymousAsked on 14 Mar 2019How big will Lyft's IPO be? Heard Uber is looking to IPO later in the year as well. Which should I get?1 answerAnswerBump0

Isaac Chan, Business  at NUSLevel 8. WizardAnswered on 18 Mar 2019Based on what I have read, it seems that Lyft's IPO will be huge as well, alongside Uber. Lyft is estimated to have a valuation of $23 bn, with a share price of $62 to $68 USD. It's revenue actually doubled in 2018, but it's still not profitable. Uber IPO is actually estimated to be much bigger at $90 bn. Uber is the much bigger company here, with higher topline and valuation...0 comments1
